modName: Black Sacrament Armor New Textures Female Only
summary: A new texture I\'ve made for the Black Sacrament Armor made by  AmethystDeceiver. There\'s a White Version, a Less White Version, a Dark Red Version, a More Darker Version and a little retexture to the cowl for go with Nightingale Prime(Leather Version). It\'s only for the females for the moment.
descriptionHtml:
Black Sacrament Armor New Textures (female only) by AngelsTears

---------------------

DESCRIPTION :

This mod is a new textures for the Black Sacrament Armor made by AmethystDeceive. The armor is more darker, and the grey colors are replaced with white(there\'s a less white version, a dark red version, and a more darker version). This is female only for the moment, i\'m working for males textures. There\'s the matched pants version, and the normal version, choose only one. (see screenshots)
There\'re the new texture for the Hood Add-on, require Hood Add-on made by AmethystDeceive.

I\'ve made a new texture for the cowl, with Nightingale Prime(Leather Version) colors, see screenshots.
The More Darker Version is for males and females

---------------------

REQUIREMENT :

Nightingale retex - Black Sacrament - craftable ninja armor -> http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696

--------------------

OPTIONAL, BUT HIGHLY RECOMMENDED :

Nightingale Prime (Leather Version), for my \"Nightingale Color For the Cowl\" : http://www.fileplanet.com/224091/220000/fileinfo/Elder-Scrolls-V:-Skyrim---Nightingale-Prime-Mod-v2.0-(Leather-Version)


---------------------

INSTALLATION :

Unpack files and place \"textures\" folder in your \"data\" folder of Skyrim, overwrite the existing files.

---------------------

UN-INSTALLATION :

If you don\'t like the new textures, overwrite them with the original textures of Black Sacrament Armor.

---------------------

CREDITS : 

Bethesda for created Skyrim
AmethystDeceive for created the (beautiful) Black Sacrament Armor

---------------------

Mods used in screenshots :

Better Females by Bella -> http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Lightning Blaze Edge -> http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4267
Lightning Hair -> http://www.mediafire.com/?ovyyjvs83n54jwn

----------------------

Upload your images if you are happy of this mod and, don\'t forget to endorse it :) ! If you like it....
author: AngelsTears
